title: Ability, Abroad, Abstract (New Series!)
description:
On episode 390 we debut a new series that we'll just call "Letters," for the time being. Very similar to "Double Rainbow," we go down the dictionary  in alphabetical order. For non-native English speakers it's great way to learn English on the side; for native English speakers it's the perfect mixture of boredom and education to help you fall asleep. Enjoy!
